title: Integrated Education on High-Performance Alloy Design and Performance Prediction

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Need for education design optimized for smartphone-based learning environments for managers/leaders within corporations

learning_goals: One can explain the integration principles of first-principles calculations (DFT) and chemical short-range order (CSRO) models
One can practice building alloy databases and applying machine learning-based performance prediction models
One can visualize performance goal-based alloy design processes and communicate them to team members

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
